\begin{equation}
\langle V_2 | = \int d^{26} p
\left( \langle 0; p | \otimes \langle 0; -p | \right)
(c^{(1)}_0 + c^{(2)}_0)\exp\left(
-\sum_{n = 1}^{ \infty} (-1)^n
[a^{(1)}_n a^{(2)}_n+c^{(1)}_n b^{(2)}_n+c^{(2)}_n b^{(1)}_n] \right)\,.
 \label{eq:v2}
